name: Become Like Me!!!
description:
"Become Like Me!!!" is a fast-paced arcade game where you play as an otaku on a mission to convert as many people as possible into copies of yourself. 

You only have two minutes to convert as many people as possible before time runs out, so you'll need to be quick! You also need to beware of those who may not agree with your plan...

Turbo Charged Arcade Experience

  • Fast-paced arcade action!
  • Vibrant mix of 3D and pixel art
  • Simple controls and accessible gameplay for players of all skill levels
  • Randomized elements (no procedural generation!) to keep each run unique!

Controls

  • Movement: Up, Down, Left, Right
  • Pause: P / Start button
